H0.text: The French town of Bordeaux lies on which river. Dordogne

H1.text: The French town of Bordeaux lies on which river. Loire

H2.text: The French town of Bordeaux lies on which river. Rhone

H3.text: The French town of Bordeaux lies on which river. Garona

A4.text: The Garonne ( … ; Catalan, Basque and Occitan: Garona, … ) is a river that flows from the central Spanish Pyrenees to the Gironde estuary at the French port of Bordeaux.

A5.text: The Garonne meets the Dordogne at the Bec d'Ambès, forming the Gironde estuary.
